::Grounded::
Grounded had to think quick and made something up. 
"Listen Aerotaur just sent me a message that he wanted you to take on 
the most important job out of all of us to win this battle.
He needs you to help me find the ships defense controls and exterior 
gun controls. He is trusting this job to you cause he thinks you are 
the best one for the job."
He said this even though Aerotaur had not given any such commands. I 
hope this works.
--- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> Trinity::
> 
> "Please Grounded... Let me go out" begged Trinity "My pals need 
me..."
